long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is made for those who have ADD/ADHD and who have a hard time staying focused when reading. This extension offers enhanced text readability by employing a unique feature that highlights the first few letters of most words in bold.

Key Features:
1. Toggle Bold Reading: Easily switch between enabling or disabling the bold reading mode according to your preference.
2. Automatic Mode: Activate this option to automatically enable Bold Reading on every webpage you visit, ensuring a consistent reading experience.
3. Exclude Websites: Personalize your browsing experience by excluding specific websites from the Bold Reading feature. These sites will appear as normal, without any modifications.

By providing a simple and effective solution, our extension aims to alleviate reading challenges and enhance focus for individuals with ADD/ADHD. Install now and experience a more accessible and focused reading environment.
